TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICredentials

summary.span: 提供用于检索 Web 客户端身份验证的凭据的基本身份验证接口。

span.span: Provides the base authentication interface for retrieving credentials for Web client authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供了提供网络凭据对应用程序的对象的方法。The interface provides the method to objects that supply network credentials to applications. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用接口。The following example illustrates how to use the interface. [!code-cpp[ICredential#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ICredential/CPP/icredential.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ICredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ICredential/CS/icredential.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ICredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ICredential/VB/icredential.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.NetworkCredential GetCredential (Uri uri, string authType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkCredential GetCredential(class System.Uri uri, string authType) cil managed
public: System::Net::NetworkCredential ^ GetCredential(Uri ^ uri, System::String ^ authType);

param.name: uri
param.span: 客户端为其提供身份验证的 。

span.span: The that the client is providing authentication for.

param.name: authType
param.span: 属性中定义的身份验证类型。

span.span: The type of authentication, as defined in the property.

summary.span: 返回与指定的 URI 关联的 对象，以及身份验证类型。

span.span: Returns a object that is associated with the specified URI, and authentication type.

returns.span: 与指定的 URI 和身份验证类型关联的 ；如果没有可用的凭据，则为 。

span.span: The that is associated with the specified URI and authentication type, or, if no credentials are available, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回实例，其中包含与指定的 URI 和授权方案关联的凭据。The method returns a instance that contains the credentials that are associated with the specified URI and authorization scheme. 无凭据不可用时方法返回`null`。When no credentials are available, the method returns `null`. ## Examples 使用以下检索实例。The following uses to retrieve a instance.
